Articles.Content:
Hey guy's

With the release of steams HTC Vive later this year, I was wondering if there were any plans to make ksp vr compatible. I don't think many games would come close to the experience you'd get in jet packing across a planet or an EVA in low orbit. Let alone landing your space plane while in cockpit view.

Sorry if this has already been discussed.

KSP can be made to work in Oculus (I've seen it, though there's no stock support I'm aware of so don't ask me how). You cant really get an appreciation of what that does from youtube but I imagine it would be cool as all get out. I'll make a note that if my mission control group can get some Oculus Rift kits (we have 1 already) we should look into that.

Hum. Not my type of coffee, but I guess there are people playing KSP in first person view.

Personally, I feel a bit claustrophobic inside Jeb's head.
